name: Apache Tika
details: The Apache Tikatrade toolkit detects and extracts metadata and structured text content from various documents using existing parser libraries

name: PhantomJS
details: PhantomJS is a headless WebKit scriptable with a JavaScript API It has fast and native support for various web standards DOM handling CSS selector JSON Canvas and SVG

name: Portia
details: Portia is a tool for visually scraping web sites without any programming knowledge Just annotate web pages with a point and click editor to indicate what data you want to extract and portia will learn how to scrape similar pages from the site Portia has a web based UI served by a Twisted server so you can install it on almost any modern platform

name: Scraper - Google Chrome Extension
details: Scraper is a simple data mining extension for Google Chrometrade that is useful for online research when you need to quickly analyze data in spreadsheet form

name: Scrapy
details: Scrapy is a fast highlevel screen scraping and web crawling framework used to crawl websites and extract structured data from their pages It can be used for a wide range of purposes from data mining to monitoring and automated testing
